author: ekoneil
msg: Add support for enabling / disabling HTML table row group rendering.  It's now possible to toggle the rendering of <tbody>, <thead>, and <tfoot> so that they are all present or all omitted.
This also now supports re-ordering <tfoot> and <tbody> when enabled to conform to the HTML 4.01 spec.
BEEHIVE-319    	 data grid needs to support thead / tbody / tfoot reordering
